aboutChallengeText: We're looking for node operators and admins who can help develop the Celo menu. Spin up a validator or full node, build operational experience, and help the community prepare for opening night.
makeWithCeloSubtitle: Get a taste of Baklava, Celo’s incentivized testnet, and participate in The Great Celo Stake Off
greatStakeOffSubtitle:
Win prizes by operating and hardening
the Baklava Testnet
purposeText: Learn how to run a node on Celo’s peer-to-peer network and take a slice of up to <0>2 million Celo Gold in rewards.</0>*
challengeText: Let the staking season commence! Starting December 4th, all chefs, bakers, and validators are invited to compete for the ultimate glory: honor, food, and Celo Gold.
whoText: If you have a technical background and you’re interested in open source, security, or building & operating infrastructure, you’d make a perfect Celo validator!
leaderboardTitle:
The Great Celo Stake Off
Leaderboard
prizeInfo: The top 50 eligible participants may receive Celo Gold, subject to <0>Terms & Conditions</0>
developerSDKsubtitle: Innovative tools to build native mobile dApps
stackDescription: Each layer of the technical stack is designed to meet mobile user needs.
fullStackText: Each layer of the technical stack is designed to meet mobile user needs.

engage.contributeText: There are a variety of resources to support contributions to Celo, including: grants, security bounties, an Ecosystem Fund, fellowships, and more.

validators.caption:
Participate in testing and hardening the Celo Protocol.
Deploy a Full Node or Validator and win prizes.

developers.caption:
Try out the Celo Protocol and Celo Wallet.
Build dApps for the Celo platform.

tutorial.title: Tutorials
tutorial.text: Get started, learn how to deploy contracts, and more

levelLabel.mobileText: Seamless experience enabled by stablecoins and mobile-friendly proof of stake protocol.
levelLabel.protocolText: Stablecoins built on the underlying smart contract platform.
levelLabel.proofText: Smart contract platform with fast finality and mobile client support.

feat.fastUltraLight: Very Fast Sync for Ultra-light Clients
feat.programmableText: Programmable smart contract platform compatible with Ethereum Virtual Machine.
feat.gasText: Option to pay transaction fees in stable currency.
feat.ultraText: Block headers optimized for fast mobile phone synchronization.
feat.custodyText: Users have access to and control of their account secret keys.
feat.stakeText: Permissionless consensus algorithm running on decentralized infrastructure.
feat.govText: Protocol changes managed via on-chain governance.
feat.pkiText: Mapping of phone numbers to addresses to facilitate user experience.
feat.stableText: Native support for multiple ERC20-like stable currencies.

mobile.title: Applications
mobile.text: Send or Request cUSD easily with anyone in your address book, powered by decentralized phone number verification

protocol.title: Core Contracts
protocol.text: Designed to support an ecology of stable value currencies. The first stablecoin, cUSD, is pegged to the US Dollar.

proof.title: Blockchain
proof.text: Open source smart contract platform built on decentralized infrastructure.
proof.permissionless: Proof of Stake based consensus with high throughput, low latency, and zero carbon

updates.title: Developer Updates
updates.latestUpdates: Receive the latest updates to your inbox

sandbox.title: Sample Celo Integration
